info.title: Greenhouse Harvest API
info.description:
The Greenhouse Harvest API v3 provides programmatic access to Greenhouse recruiting data. It is a RESTful API using resource-oriented URLs, standard HTTP methods, JSON-formatted responses, and OAuth 2.0 token-based authentication.

This specification covers the Partner Integration flow using OAuth 2.0 Authorization Code Grant.

Key features:
- Manage candidates, applications, jobs, and offers
- Access scorecards, interviews, and hiring workflows
- Configure custom fields, departments, and offices
- Cursor-based pagination on all list endpoints
- Rate limiting with standard headers

post.summary: Generate or refresh OAuth 2.0 access token
post.description: Exchange an authorization code for access and refresh tokens (grant_type=authorization_code), or refresh an expired access token (grant_type=refresh_token). Client authentication via HTTP Basic using Base64-encoded client_id:client_secret.

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: Authorization code received from the callback (required when grant_type=authorization_code). Expires after 1 minute.

parameters.name: refresh_token
parameters.description: Refresh token (required when grant_type=refresh_token). Expires after 24 hours.

requestBody.description: Empty body; parameters are sent as query parameters

parameters.name: created_at
parameters.description: Filter by creation date. Supports operators: gte|, lte|, gt|, lt| (e.g. gte|2024-01-01T00:00:00Z)

parameters.name: updated_at
parameters.description: Filter by last updated date. Supports operators: gte|, lte|, gt|, lt|

post.summary: Revoke all permissions for a user

greenhouse_oauth.description: OAuth 2.0 Authorization Code Grant for Greenhouse partner integrations. Access tokens expire after 1 hour. Refresh tokens expire after 24 hours. Authorization codes expire after 1 minute. Client authentication uses HTTP Basic with Base64-encoded client_id:client_secret. All list endpoints require authorization by a Site Admin user.

PerPage.name: per_page
PerPage.description: Number of results per page (1-500, default 100). Only valid on the first request; subsequent pages use the cursor.

Cursor.name: cursor
Cursor.description: Opaque cursor for pagination. Taken from the Link response header. Must be the only query parameter when used.

LinkPagination.description: Pagination link header (RFC 5988). Contains rel="next" URL when more pages exist.

Unauthorized.description: Unauthorized - invalid or expired access token. Generate a new token or refresh.

Forbidden.description: Forbidden - insufficient permissions. The authorizing user may not have Site Admin privileges.

NotFound.description: Not found - resource does not exist

TooManyRequests.description: Rate limit exceeded. Check Retry-After header.

refresh_token.description: Refresh token (expires in 24 hours). Store securely and use to obtain new access tokens.

expires_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the access_token expires

result_url.description: URL to retrieve results when complete

to_stage_id.description: Target stage ID. Omit to advance to next stage.

to_job_id.description: Target job ID for job transfer.

to_job_interview_stage_id.description: Target stage. Defaults to initial stage if omitted.

url.description: URL to the file (alternative to content)

fields.description: Fields to anonymize (e.g. name, emails, phone_numbers, etc.)

value_type.description: Data type (short_text, long_text, single_select, multi_select, date, number, etc.)
